multi_add_portrait;Saleh;MidLeft;Dozla;MidRight
expression;Dozla;Smile
bop_portrait;Dozla
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Look at these mountains, Saleh!|Fire and stone as far as the eye can see!
expression;Saleh;NoSmile
speak;Saleh;The mountains of Neleras.|One of the most volcanic regions in all of Magvel.
bop_portrait;Dozla
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha!|Just the kind of place that gets the blood pumping!|Nothing like a bit of danger to make you feel alive!
speak;Saleh;You seem rather... enthusiastic about traversing such treacherous terrain.
speak;Dozla;Of course!|What's an adventure without a little risk?|Lady L'Arachel would expect nothing less than my full excitement!
speak;Saleh;I see.|I myself hope to find some historical sites within these mountains.
speak;Saleh;The ancient texts speak of ruins from the era of the Great Dragon.|They may contain knowledge that has been lost to time.
speak;Dozla;Historical ruins, you say?|Gwa ha ha!|Those always have the best treasures!|And the most dangerous traps!
expression;Saleh;NoSmile
speak;Saleh;Dozla, I feel I should warn you.|These mountains are home to many dangerous creatures.
speak;Saleh;Gorgons have been sighted with increasing frequency.
speak;Saleh;Their stone gaze can paralyze a man in seconds.
bop_portrait;Dozla
speak;Dozla;Gorgons, you say?|Gwa ha ha HA!|Excellent news!
speak;Saleh;Excellent?|I don't think you understand the danger, Dozla.
speak;Saleh;Gorgons are not the only threat.|There are reports of gargoyles, cyclopes, and other creatures born of darkness.
speak;Dozla;Even better!|I HOPE we encounter these foul beasts!|My axe has been thirsting for a good battle!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|What's the point of an adventure if there aren't any monsters to vanquish?
speak;Saleh;Your enthusiasm for combat is... concerning.
speak;Saleh;These creatures are not to be taken lightly.|Many experienced warriors have fallen in these mountains.
speak;Dozla;Bah!|Those warriors didn't have the might of Dozla on their side!|Or the divine blessing of Lady L'Arachel!
speak;Dozla;Don't you worry, Saleh!|I'll protect you while you do your scholarly poking about in those ruins!
speak;Saleh;I appreciate the offer, but I am capable of defending myself.
speak;Saleh;The magic of Caer Pelyn has served me well against such threats before.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|That's the spirit!|Between your magic and my axe, those monsters don't stand a chance!
expression;Dozla;NormalBlink
speak;Dozla;Let them come!|I'll show them the might of Dozla, faithful servant to Lady L'Arachel!
expression;Saleh;Smile
speak;Saleh;Your confidence is... somewhat reassuring, I suppose.
speak;Saleh;Just remember to exercise caution.|The heat of these volcanic mountains can drain one's strength quickly.
expression;Dozla;Smile
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|A little heat never bothered me!|After fighting alongside Lady L'Arachel, nothing can quench my fighting spirit!
speak;Dozla;Now, which way to these ruins of yours?|I'm eager to start cracking some monster skulls!
expression;Saleh;NoSmile
speak;Saleh;According to my research, they should be beyond the next ridge.
speak;Saleh;But we should move quietly.|No need to announce our presence to every creature in the mountains.
bop_portrait;Dozla
speak;Dozla;Quietly? Me?|Gwa ha ha!|I'll try my best, but no promises!
speak;Dozla;Lead on, Saleh!|To adventure and glory!
expression;Saleh;CloseEyes
speak;Saleh;*sigh*|This is going to be a long journey.
